VRPoseLinearVelocity.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The linearVelocity read-only property of the interface returns an array representing the linear velocity vector of the at the current , in meters per second.

blockquote.para: Note: This property was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.

remarks.para: In other words, the current velocity at which the sensor is moving along the x, y, and z axes.

-WebVR API homepage

VRPoseLinearVelocity.value: A , or null if the VR sensor is not able to provide linear velocity data.
